程序包 net.minecraft.entity.boss.dragon.phase

接口 IPhase

  • 所有已知实现类:
    PhaseBase, PhaseChargingPlayer, PhaseDying, PhaseHoldingPattern, PhaseHover, PhaseLanding, PhaseLandingApproach, PhaseSittingAttacking, PhaseSittingBase, PhaseSittingFlaming, PhaseSittingScanning, PhaseStrafePlayer, PhaseTakeoff
    public interface IPhase

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void doClientRenderEffects()
      Generates particle effects appropriate to the phase (or sometimes sounds).
      void doLocalUpdate()
      Gives the phase a chance to update its status.
      float getAdjustedDamage​(MultiPartEntityPart pt, DamageSource src, float damage)
      Normally, just returns damage.
      boolean getIsStationary()  
      float getMaxRiseOrFall()
      Returns the maximum amount dragon may rise or fall during this phase
      Vec3d getTargetLocation()
      Returns the location the dragon is flying toward
      PhaseList<? extends IPhase> getType()  
      float getYawFactor()  
      void initPhase()
      Called when this phase is set to active
      void onCrystalDestroyed​(EntityEnderCrystal crystal, BlockPos pos, DamageSource dmgSrc, EntityPlayer plyr)  
      void removeAreaEffect()  

    • 方法详细资料

      • getIsStationary

        boolean getIsStationary()

      • doClientRenderEffects

        void doClientRenderEffects()
        Generates particle effects appropriate to the phase (or sometimes sounds). Called by dragon's onLivingUpdate. Only used when worldObj.isRemote.

      • doLocalUpdate

        void doLocalUpdate()
        Gives the phase a chance to update its status. Called by dragon's onLivingUpdate. Only used when !worldObj.isRemote.

      • onCrystalDestroyed

        void onCrystalDestroyed​(EntityEnderCrystal crystal,
                        BlockPos pos,
                        DamageSource dmgSrc,
                        @Nullable
                        EntityPlayer plyr)

      • initPhase

        void initPhase()
        Called when this phase is set to active

      • removeAreaEffect

        void removeAreaEffect()

      • getMaxRiseOrFall

        float getMaxRiseOrFall()
        Returns the maximum amount dragon may rise or fall during this phase

      • getYawFactor

        float getYawFactor()

      • getType

        PhaseList<? extends IPhase> getType()

      • getTargetLocation

        @Nullable
Vec3d getTargetLocation()
        Returns the location the dragon is flying toward

      • getAdjustedDamage

        float getAdjustedDamage​(MultiPartEntityPart pt,
                        DamageSource src,
                        float damage)
        Normally, just returns damage. If dragon is sitting and src is an arrow, arrow is enflamed and zero damage returned.
